articles.title: Agreement on Cooperation in Hydrology Signed between DPRK and China
articles.content:
Agreement on Cooperation in Hydrology Signed between DPRK and China 
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- An agreement on cooperation in the hydrological work of the Rivers. Amrok and Tuman between the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and the Ministry of Water Resources of China was signed in Pyongyang today.
 The agreement was inked by Ko Il Hun, director of the Hydro-Meteorological Service of the DPRK and E Jingping, vice-minister of Water Resources of China who is heading a delegation of the Chinese Ministry of Water Resources.    
 Minutes of talks on cooperation in the hydrological work between the delegations of both countries was signed.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Published in Pamphlet in Laos
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Famous Work Published in Pamphlet in Laos 
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Leader Kim Jong Il's immortal famous work "On Having a Correct Viewpoint and Understanding of the Juche Philosophy" was brought out in pamphlet Monday by the Lao State Publishing House.
 The work, issued on October 25, Juche 79 (1990), expounds the originality and superiority of the Juche philosophy in comparison with the preceding philosophy, the essential character of  ma n as the social being and the matter of having a correct understanding of the three transformations-the transformation of nature, of man and of society.

articles.title: S. Korean Leading Trade Unionists Fined
articles.content:
S. Korean Leading Trade Unionists Fined 
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- The Supreme Court of south Korea fined former leaders of the "KAL Pilots Union" on the charge of masterminding a strike for the improvement of working conditions, according to south Korean KBS.
 The court decision charged them with the interference in the execution of duties, ruling that the demands made by the union could not be an object of collective negotiation, being as act of encroaching upon the right of management of the employers.

Greetings to President of Guinea-Bissau
articles.content:
Greetings to President of Guinea-Bissau
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of greetings to Henrique Pereira Rosa, president of Guinea-Bissau, on September 16 on the occasion of the 31st anniversary of the proclamation of the Republic of Guinea-Bissau.
 The message extended warm congratulations to the president and, through him, to the government and people of Guinea-Bissau on this anniversary.  In the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would continue to develop favorably, it sincerely wished him success in his work for national unity and the prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Korean Cadres Meet Cuban Ambassador
articles.content:
Korean Cadres Meet Cuban Ambassador
    Pyongyang, September 23 (KCNA) -- Secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea Choe Thae Bok and Foreign Minister Paek Nam Sun met and conversed with Cuban Ambassador e. p. to the DPRK Esteban Lobaina Romero who paid a farewell call on them today.
